physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Asymptomatic loose, pendulous skin confined to volar finger pads and toes. Erythema, warmth, and pruritus of hands preceding skin changes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Degree of skin laxity remained stable since childhood.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Loosely redundant skin on the finger pads bilaterally, soft on palpation; skin remained depressed when pressure applied.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Negative rheumatoid factor and anticyclic citrullinated peptide.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Plain radiography of the hands showed stable minor erosive changes. Skin biopsy from left middle finger showed marked decrease in elastic fibers.
